content: free pattern - ac1-3 schuyler by jennifer burke all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 12/20/25 © fairmount fibers ltd 2025 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 2 free pattern - ac1-3 size instructions 21 circumference 8 depth using waste yarn smaller ndl and long-tail cast-on co 61 sts join being careful not to twist and pm to show beg materials of round manos del uruguay silk blend 50g approx 150yds with mc k1 *yo k1 repeat from * to last st k1 120 sts 70% extrafine merino wool 30% silk 1 skip each mc and set-up round 1 *k1 sl1 wyif repeat from * to end of round cc shown in 3014 natural mc and 3112 moss cc set-up round 2 *sl1 wyib p1 repeat from * to end of round us 7/4 5 mm ndls 16 circular and dpn or size to repeat previous 2 rnds once more work in 1 x 1 rib until obtain gauge band meas 1 us 5/3 75 mm 16 circular next round *k12 m1 repeat from * to end of round 130 sts waste yarn marker join cc and work chart a repeating rnds 1 8 four times 32 rnds total work chart b changing to dpn gauge when necessary 25 sts and 29 row = 4 /10 cm in fair isle pattern with cut yarn thread through rem 13 sts and fasten_off larger needles finishing unravel waste yarn don t worry hat will not fall apart weave in ends block all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 12/20/25 © fairmount fibers ltd 2025 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 2
